    Package Description
    client

    • Uses of Packet in client

      Methods in client that return Packet 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Packet FileTransferClient.receiveServerResponse()
      Receive response from server.
      Packet FileTransferClient.requestServer​(java.lang.String requestString)
      Make a request to the server with only a requestString, and receive response.
      Packet FileTransferClient.requestServer​(java.lang.String requestString, byte[] requestBytes)
      Make a request to the server, and receive response.

    • Uses of Packet in helpers

      Methods in helpers with parameters of type Packet 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean DownloadHelper.checkSource​(Packet receivedPacket)
      Check if source of Packet is the corresponding uploader.
      boolean UploadHelper.checkSource​(Packet receivedPacket)
      Check if source of Packet is the corresponding downloader.
      void DownloadHelper.processPacket​(Packet receivedPacket)
      Process received Packet with byte[] from uploader.
      void DownloadHelper.restrictResend​(Packet packet)
      Stops resending timed-out packets when number of resends is above threshold.
      void UploadHelper.restrictResend​(Packet packet)
      Stops resending timed-out packets when number of resends is above threshold.
      void UploadHelper.sendPacketToDownloader​(Packet packet)
      Send packet to the corresponding downloadHelper.
      void DownloadHelper.sendPacketToUploader​(Packet packet)
      Send packet to the corresponding downloadHelper.

    • Uses of Packet in network

      Methods in network that return Packet 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Packet TransportLayer.receivePacket​(java.net.DatagramSocket socket)
      Receive a Packet (in a DatagramPacket) via a DatagramSocket.
      Methods in network with parameters of type Packet 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void TransportLayer.sendPacket​(java.net.DatagramSocket socket, Packet packet, int destinationPort)
      Send a Packet (in a DatagramPacket) via a DatagramSocket.

    • Uses of Packet in server

      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Respond to a DISCOVER send by a client.

      Respond to a INIT_SESSION send by a client, and start a new clientHandler.

      Set client network information, based on received init packet.
      Constructors in server with parameters of type Packet 
      Constructor Description

      Modifier and Type Method Description
